TCName.name: emergencyPREQ_VendorArticle
TCName.supplier: SELECT DISTINCT LIFNR FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING WHERE LIFNR NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT LIFNR FROM ZWOWC_ROSTER_DATE) AND RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG ='Y' AND LIFNR LIKE '00%'
TCName.rosterdate: select * from ZWOWC_ROSTER_DATE where roster_date in (select(today())) and lifnr ='supplier'
TCName.article: select master.matnr,listing.lifnr,listing.perpetual_flag,listing.alc_status,listing.article_om,master.pbd_ind,listing.random_weight_flg,master.random_weight_flg from zwowc_article_listing listing,zwowc_article_master master where master.matnr = listing.matnr and listing.alc_status not in ('DA','ES','EC') and listing.lifnr = 'supplier' and listing.random_weight_flg = 'N' and master.pbd_ind = 'isPBD'
TCName.randArticle: select master.matnr,listing.lifnr,listing.perpetual_flag,listing.alc_status,listing.article_om,master.pbd_ind,listing.random_weight_flg,master.random_weight_flg from zwowc_article_listing listing,zwowc_article_master master where master.matnr = listing.matnr and listing.alc_status not in ('DA','ES','EC') and listing.lifnr = 'supplier' and listing.random_weight_flg = 'Y' and master.random_weight_flg ='Y'
TCName.articledetailsDB: SELECT LISTING.MATNR,MASTER.ARTICLE_DESC,SOH.STORE_SOH,UOM.MEINH,LISTING.ARTICLE_OM FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING LISTING,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER MASTER,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM UOM,LOCAL_WOW_SOH SOH WHERE LISTING.MATNR = MASTER.MATNR AND MASTER.MATNR = UOM.MATNR AND LISTING.MATNR = UOM.MATNR AND SOH.ARTICLE = LISTING.MATNR AND LISTING.MATNR = 'article' AND UOM.ORDER_UOM_IND = 'Y'
TCName.baseuom: SELECT meins FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM WHERE MATNR = 'article' AND ORDER_UOM_IND = 'Y'

TCName.name: manualPREQVendorArticle_WithRoster
TCName.supplier: SELECT ZAL.MATNR, roster_date_1 AS "Delivery Roster", delivery_date_1 AS "Next Delivery",delivery_date_2 AS "Following Delivery",lwdr.lifnr AS "Supplier" FROM SAAP.LOCAL_WOW_ROSTER_DATE LWDR JOIN SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAL ON (ZAL.LIFNR = LWDR.LIFNR) and ZAL.SOURCE_OF_SUPPLY='1'
TCName.article: SELECT ZAL.MATNR, roster_date_1 AS "Delivery Roster", delivery_date_1 AS "Next Delivery",delivery_date_2 AS "Following Delivery" FROM SAAP.LOCAL_WOW_ROSTER_DATE LWDR JOIN SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAL ON (ZAL.LIFNR = LWDR.LIFNR) and ZAL.SOURCE_OF_SUPPLY='1' and lwdr.lifnr = 'supplier'
TCName.articledetailsDB: SELECT LISTING.MATNR,MASTER.ARTICLE_DESC,SOH.STORE_SOH,UOM.MEINH,LISTING.ARTICLE_OM FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING LISTING,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER MASTER,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM UOM,LOCAL_WOW_SOH SOH WHERE LISTING.MATNR = MASTER.MATNR AND MASTER.MATNR = UOM.MATNR AND LISTING.MATNR = UOM.MATNR AND SOH.ARTICLE = LISTING.MATNR AND LISTING.MATNR = 'article' AND UOM.ORDER_UOM_IND = 'Y'
TCName.baseuom: SELECT meinh FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM WHERE MATNR = 'article' AND ORDER_UOM_IND = 'Y'

TCName.name: manualPREQDCArticle_WithRoster
TCName.supplier: SELECT ZAL.MATNR, roster_date_1 AS "Delivery Roster", delivery_date_1 AS "Next Delivery",delivery_date_2 AS "Following Delivery",lwdr.lifnr AS "Supplier" FROM SAAP.LOCAL_WOW_ROSTER_DATE LWDR JOIN SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAL ON (ZAL.LIFNR = LWDR.LIFNR) and ZAL.SOURCE_OF_SUPPLY='2'
TCName.article: SELECT ZAL.MATNR, roster_date_1 AS "Delivery Roster", delivery_date_1 AS "Next Delivery",delivery_date_2 AS "Following Delivery" FROM SAAP.LOCAL_WOW_ROSTER_DATE LWDR JOIN SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAL ON (ZAL.LIFNR = LWDR.LIFNR) and ZAL.SOURCE_OF_SUPPLY='2' and lwdr.lifnr = 'supplier'
TCName.articledetailsDB: SELECT LISTING.MATNR,MASTER.ARTICLE_DESC,SOH.STORE_SOH,UOM.MEINH,LISTING.ARTICLE_OM FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING LISTING,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER MASTER,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM UOM,LOCAL_WOW_SOH SOH WHERE LISTING.MATNR = MASTER.MATNR AND MASTER.MATNR = UOM.MATNR AND LISTING.MATNR = UOM.MATNR AND SOH.ARTICLE = LISTING.MATNR AND LISTING.MATNR = 'article' AND UOM.ORDER_UOM_IND = 'Y'
TCName.baseuom: SELECT meins FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM WHERE MATNR = 'article' AND ORDER_UOM_IND = 'Y'

TCName.name: manualPREQDCErrorMessage_noRoster
TCName.supplier: SELECT DISTINCT LIFNR FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING WHERE LIFNR NOT IN (SELECT LIFNR FROM ZWOWC_ROSTER_DATE) AND LIFNR NOT LIKE '0%' AND LIFNR != ''
TCName.article: SELECT LISTING.matnr FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING LISTING, ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER MASTER WHERE LISTING.LIFNR IN ('supplier') AND LISTING.MATNR = MASTER.MATNR AND LISTING.MATNR LIKE '7%'
TCName.rosterdate: select * from ZWOWC_ROSTER_DATE where roster_date in (select(today())) and lifnr ='supplier'
TCName.articledetailsDB: SELECT LISTING.MATNR,MASTER.ARTICLE_DESC,SOH.STORE_SOH,UOM.MEINH,LISTING.ARTICLE_OM FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING LISTING,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER MASTER,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM UOM,LOCAL_WOW_SOH SOH WHERE LISTING.MATNR = MASTER.MATNR AND MASTER.MATNR = UOM.MATNR AND LISTING.MATNR = UOM.MATNR AND SOH.ARTICLE = LISTING.MATNR AND LISTING.MATNR = 'article' AND UOM.ORDER_UOM_IND = 'Y'
TCName.baseuom: SELECT meins FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM WHERE MATNR = 'article' AND ORDER_UOM_IND = 'Y'

TCName.name: manualPREQWarehouse_ProduceArticle
TCName.supplier: SELECT ZAL.MATNR, roster_date_1 AS "Delivery Roster", delivery_date_1 AS "Next Delivery",delivery_date_2 AS "Following Delivery",lwdr.lifnr AS "Supplier" FROM SAAP.LOCAL_WOW_ROSTER_DATE LWDR JOIN SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAL ON (ZAL.LIFNR = LWDR.LIFNR) and ZAL.SOURCE_OF_SUPPLY='2'
TCName.article: SELECT ZAL.MATNR, roster_date_1 AS "Delivery Roster", delivery_date_1 AS "Next Delivery",delivery_date_2 AS "Following Delivery" FROM SAAP.LOCAL_WOW_ROSTER_DATE LWDR JOIN SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAL ON (ZAL.LIFNR = LWDR.LIFNR) and ZAL.SOURCE_OF_SUPPLY='2' and lwdr.lifnr = 'supplier'
TCName.getArticle: SELECT MASTER.MATNR FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER MASTER,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING LIST,ZWOWC_ART_LIST_DEPARTMENT DEPT WHERE LIST.MATNR = MASTER.MATNR AND LIST.MATNR = DEPT.MATNR AND DEPT.MATNR = MASTER.MATNR AND DEPT.DEPT = '30'
TCName.articledetailsDB: SELECT LISTING.MATNR,MASTER.ARTICLE_DESC,SOH.STORE_SOH,UOM.MEINH,LISTING.ARTICLE_OM FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING LISTING,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER MASTER,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM UOM,LOCAL_WOW_SOH SOH WHERE LISTING.MATNR = MASTER.MATNR AND MASTER.MATNR = UOM.MATNR AND LISTING.MATNR = UOM.MATNR AND SOH.ARTICLE = LISTING.MATNR AND LISTING.MATNR = 'article' AND UOM.ORDER_UOM_IND = 'Y'
TCName.baseuom: SELECT meins FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM WHERE MATNR = 'article' AND ORDER_UOM_IND = 'Y'

TCName.supplier: SELECT ZAL.MATNR, roster_date_1 AS "Delivery Roster", delivery_date_1 AS "Next Delivery",delivery_date_2 AS "Following Delivery",lwdr.lifnr AS "Supplier" FROM SAAP.LOCAL_WOW_ROSTER_DATE LWDR JOIN SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAL ON (ZAL.LIFNR = LWDR.LIFNR) and ZAL.SOURCE_OF_SUPPLY='2'
TCName.article: SELECT ZAL.MATNR, roster_date_1 AS "Delivery Roster", delivery_date_1 AS "Next Delivery",delivery_date_2 AS "Following Delivery" FROM SAAP.LOCAL_WOW_ROSTER_DATE LWDR JOIN SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAL ON (ZAL.LIFNR = LWDR.LIFNR) and ZAL.SOURCE_OF_SUPPLY='2' and lwdr.lifnr = 'supplier'
TCName.getArticle: SELECT MASTER.MATNR FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER MASTER,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING LIST,ZWOWC_ART_LIST_DEPARTMENT DEPT WHERE LIST.MATNR = MASTER.MATNR AND LIST.MATNR = DEPT.MATNR AND DEPT.MATNR = MASTER.MATNR AND DEPT.DEPT = '30'
TCName.articledetailsDB: SELECT LISTING.MATNR,MASTER.ARTICLE_DESC,SOH.STORE_SOH,UOM.MEINH,LISTING.ARTICLE_OM FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING LISTING,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER MASTER,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM UOM,LOCAL_WOW_SOH SOH WHERE LISTING.MATNR = MASTER.MATNR AND MASTER.MATNR = UOM.MATNR AND LISTING.MATNR = UOM.MATNR AND SOH.ARTICLE = LISTING.MATNR AND LISTING.MATNR = 'article' AND UOM.ORDER_UOM_IND = 'Y'
TCName.baseuom: SELECT meins FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM WHERE MATNR = 'article' AND ORDER_UOM_IND = 'Y'

TCName.name: manualPREQGNVendor_withSingleVN
TCName.article: SELECT MASTER.MATNR,DEPT.DEPT_NAME,list.lifnr FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER MASTER,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING LIST,ZWOWC_ART_LIST_DEPARTMENT DEPT WHERE LIST.MATNR = MASTER.MATNR AND LIST.MATNR = DEPT.MATNR AND DEPT.MATNR = MASTER.MATNR AND DEPT.DEPT NOT IN ('45') AND LIST.SOURCE_OF_SUPPLY = '1' and list.lifnr in ('supplier') AND LIST.ALC_STATUS IN ('NA','RA') ORDER BY DEPT_NAME ASC
TCName.articledetailsDB: SELECT LISTING.MATNR,MASTER.ARTICLE_DESC,SOH.STORE_SOH,UOM.MEINH,LISTING.ARTICLE_OM FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING LISTING,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER MASTER,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM UOM,LOCAL_WOW_SOH SOH WHERE LISTING.MATNR = MASTER.MATNR AND MASTER.MATNR = UOM.MATNR AND LISTING.MATNR = UOM.MATNR AND SOH.ARTICLE = LISTING.MATNR AND LISTING.MATNR = 'article' AND UOM.ORDER_UOM_IND = 'Y'
TCName.baseuom: SELECT meins FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM WHERE MATNR = 'article' AND ORDER_UOM_IND = 'Y'

TCName.baseuom: SELECT meins FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM WHERE MATNR = 'article' AND ORDER_UOM_IND = 'Y'

TCName.name: manualPREQ_1GSHavingMultipleVNVendor
TCName.articledetailsDB: SELECT LISTING.MATNR,MASTER.ARTICLE_DESC,SOH.STORE_SOH,UOM.MEINH,LISTING.ARTICLE_OM FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING LISTING,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER MASTER,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM UOM,LOCAL_WOW_SOH SOH WHERE LISTING.MATNR = MASTER.MATNR AND MASTER.MATNR = UOM.MATNR AND LISTING.MATNR = UOM.MATNR AND SOH.ARTICLE = LISTING.MATNR AND LISTING.MATNR = 'article' AND UOM.ORDER_UOM_IND = 'Y'

TCName.name: manualPREQVendor_multipleGSSingleVN
TCName.supplier: select a.matnr, lifnr from zwowc_article_listing a, zwowc_article_master b where lifnr in (select lifnr from zwowc_gs_vendor group by lifnr HAVING count(*) > 1) and a.matnr = b.matnr
TCName.article: select a.matnr, lifnr from zwowc_article_listing a, zwowc_article_master b where lifnr in (select lifnr from zwowc_gs_vendor group by lifnr HAVING count(*) > 1) and a.matnr = b.matnr and lifnr = 'supplier'
TCName.getArticle: SELECT MASTER.MATNR FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER MASTER,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING LIST,ZWOWC_ART_LIST_DEPARTMENT DEPT WHERE LIST.MATNR = MASTER.MATNR AND LIST.MATNR = DEPT.MATNR AND DEPT.MATNR = MASTER.MATNR AND DEPT.DEPT = '30'
TCName.articledetailsDB: SELECT LISTING.MATNR,MASTER.ARTICLE_DESC,SOH.STORE_SOH,UOM.MEINH,LISTING.ARTICLE_OM FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING LISTING,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER MASTER,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM UOM,LOCAL_WOW_SOH SOH WHERE LISTING.MATNR = MASTER.MATNR AND MASTER.MATNR = UOM.MATNR AND LISTING.MATNR = UOM.MATNR AND SOH.ARTICLE = LISTING.MATNR AND LISTING.MATNR = 'article' AND UOM.ORDER_UOM_IND = 'Y'
TCName.baseuom: SELECT meins FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM WHERE MATNR = 'article' AND ORDER_UOM_IND = 'Y'
